title: Workshop on Designing Analogy-Based Elementary AI Pedagogical Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational educational theories and general familiarity with elementary education settings
context.additional_context: A program for pre-service teachers to enhance their AI education design competencies in elementary education, focusing on analogy-based teaching methods centered on human-AI comparative analysis

learning_goals: When explaining AI concepts suitable for elementary learners, learners can design at least three analogy-based teaching methods utilizing human-technology comparisons.
Based on Vygotskyâ€™s ZPD (Zone of Proximal Development) theory, learners can develop at least two progressive activities for AI ethics education.

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
